DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to collect data on the safety and efficacy of using an electrical field stimulation device, compared to a sham (placebo) device, to treat urinary urgency, urinary frequency and urge incontinence.
DOC.brief_title: Electromagnetic Stimulation for the Treatment of Urge Urinary Incontinence and Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Urinary Urge Incontinence Urinary Frequency Primary complaint of Stress Incontinence Neurogenic bladder Overflow Incontinence Functional Incontinence
